code: import React from'react';import classes from'../../css/Users/Users.module.css';import noPhoto from'../../assets/img/no-photo.png';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const User=_ref=>{let{user,followingInProgress,follow,unfollow}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.info,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:'/profile/'+user.id,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:user.photos.small!==null?user.photos.small:noPhoto,alt:"",className:classes.user_photo})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.user_info,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:classes.u_name,children:user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:user.status})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:'user.location.city'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:'user.location.country'})]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.follow_buttons,children:user.followed?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{disabled:followingInProgress.some(id=>id===user.id),className:classes.unfollow_btn,onClick:()=>{unfollow(user.id);},children:"\u041E\u0442\u043F\u0438\u0441\u0430\u0442\u044C\u0441\u044F"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{disabled:followingInProgress.some(id=>id===user.id),className:classes.follow_btn,onClick:()=>{follow(user.id);},children:"\u041F\u043E\u0434\u043F\u0438\u0441\u0430\u0442\u044C\u0441\u044F"})})]});};export default User;
